content:
Authoring and HTTP (2)

Authoring and HTTP (2)

  • PUT is not fully specified
    • Does not define use of Bytes Range
  • What about HTTP Extensions?
    • Few extensions will cover all CMSs:
      • The result of using locks and versioning is system dependent
      • Client must know the consequences
    • Focus on the generic case in HTTP
    • PEP extension for each CMS can provide higher level functionality
